results.title: Effects of improved glycaemic control on calcium and magnesium homeostasis in type II diabetes.
results.text_hl: Poorly controlled @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type II diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with hypomagnesaemia, hypermagnesuria, and @<m>DISEASE_Hypercalciuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D053565 @@@hypercalciuria@@@ were allocated to treatment with either @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Glipizide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005913 @@@glipizide@@@, to determine the effects on some indices of mineral metabolism.

citations.NLM: McBain AM, Brown IR, Menzies DG, Campbell IW. Effects of improved glycaemic control on calcium and magnesium homeostasis in type II diabetes. J Clin Pathol. 1988 Sep;41(9):933-5. PMID: 3192752
citations.BibTeX: @article{3192752, title={Effects of improved glycaemic control on calcium and magnesium homeostasis in type II diabetes.}, author={McBain AM and Brown IR and Menzies DG and Campbell IW}, journal={J Clin Pathol}, volume={41}, number={9}, pages={933-5}}
